column3:
It has been a couple days, and I haven't heard back. For the record, the emails that were sent to the addresses listed in the git commits:

https://gist.github.com/isle2983/1f4bce2eb202553c3e209be5b6606745
https://gist.github.com/isle2983/e84b22121854c56cfe3829f986bcfdf6

If I hear anything, I will post it here ASAP.

The edits to these files are are all 1-liners (7b01ce254cfa0e8ae7e57a72c5

Thanks for trying to organize this. As the original author of `security-check.py` and `test-security-check.sh` I think my agreement to add an copyright header is most important, as I should have done that in the first place. The other changes, apart from @theuni's, who also agrees with the MIT license, are just typo and comment fixes so I'm fine with doing this without their agreement.\n\nSame for
